review_content: (Can) Pours clear yellow golden with big loose short-lived white head. Unpleasant aroma of corn and vegetables, with candy hints. Thin and fizzy. Wow, this is almost tasteless. Soda water with hint of beer. There is a bit of acidity at the start, some candy and corn hints in the mid palate. It’s not unpleasant because there is so little flavour

Can 355ml (Gyeongju). Clear golden colour, small white vanishing head. Aroma has green apple, sweet malts. Light-bodied. Fizzy. Flavour has mostly green apple, low bitterness. Tastes more like a cider than beer.

This was one of the worst beers i've ever had. They made a solid cheap happoshu style water alcohol with the normal filite. i'm sure that too many ajeosshis complained that it didn't taste enough like soju and cigarettes so they've altered the formula. removed the artificial and one dimensional C-hop aroma, which was the only saving grace of green filite and turned it into effluent. it has a horrendous aftertaste that you can't get rid of. good job ajeosshis. this was definitely in the top 3 worst beers i've ever had in my life if not number one.
no description is possible, just instant drain pour. why do i have to give a 0.5 score?
